Summary: 2 lites appear EVERY evening - one small, one big .. gradual descent until disappears over the tree line
divs: sighting detailsokay, where do i begin? i don't know who to go to or who to talk to. my family is experiencing a nightly phenomena of two unidentified flying objects! you have to see this to believe it. they look like two stars - 1 big (bigger than any star in the sky) and one little. they are in a diagonal formation to each other. i, personally, have been witnessing these two objects for months - actually over a year, but because of the "guise" they are going under - a star - a normal person looking at the sky would not think any different. but here is the difference: - they are in a diagonal formation to each other - one is bigger than the other - they cannot be identified - they are not planes, helicopters, or satellites - they appear at the same time every night (right before it gets totally dark - dusk) - and they disappear a couple of hours later (all the other stars are still in place!) - they disappear every night (we see them for approx. 2 to 2-1\2 hours - they fade and then get very bright - they are in direct vision of our house (almost like they are looking at us - i know that sounds a little crazy - but you have to see them for yourself!) - i have seen them for over a year, but like everyone else - thought they were stars, but i have always watched the sky - since i was a little girl - and the more i became aware, the more i noticed that they were not stars - my husband and 27 year old son (skeptics to say the least) are now very aware and have been watching another thing, we live one street away from the river. we are actually on a point - surrounded by water on three sides - and there is a lot of open space around here. there is so much more to tell you, but all i can say is see for yourself. i won't need to say another word. they're here . . . every night, but only for a couple of hours. tonight, we actually took binoculars outside to look at them - when we first looked - they looked orange on the bottom and white on the top. later, we looked again - when the big one was really bright - and we could see a cluster (with the binoculars) of a whole bunch of white lights - all close together - it was unbelievable looking. then, later tonight - i walked out after taking my shower - and the big one was gone! i continued to watch the little one with the binoculars and for the first time - saw the little one descend - much like a falling star - and then just disappear. (first time i saw them actually move). if you have any mufon people in this area - send one over with a telescope! then we can really see something! there is something happening here and it is almost surreal. i would video this, but our video camera is broke! plus, i don't know how much would actually show up on video - you actually have to look through binoculars or a telescope (we don't have a telescope) to see them more clearly. well, there are more details i could tell you, but that is enough for now. i don't know if i should report this to the police or what, but i thought mufon would be a good place to start. thanks for listening. i just wish you could see this . . . every night! p.s. - as far as the event date, like i said - it's nightly.
